ygData.subject: Re: Idea for language class...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A good meeting point also is the great room in the tunnel from Commonlands to Ro. Zone border is nearby (so you can hop and check at times), and so on. ...
ygData.messageBody:
According to Dan Alexander:
> Real good idea... until the boat crashes and we get dumped back on the
> dock, or in the water. Still, if other folks are willing to risk it, I'm
> game.

A good meeting point also is the great room in the tunnel from Commonlands to Ro.
Zone border is nearby (so you can hop and check at times), and so on.

> >* People can wait at the docks and hop on or hop off as needed.

Any stable place is better regarding that.

> >* Convientent for people already traveling between Fawdwer and Freeport

As would any place.

> >* No spells
> >* Plenty of fishing available

Not on the boat. Ever tried fishing on it? I get the message that I must be on
ground (or something like that) to fish. That's a travelling boat, not a
fishing trawler :)

> >* Boat zones periodically so skills can be checked

See above.

> >* A wide variety of people ride the boat, so it may be possible to pick up
> >other languages that you didn't plan on.

That's a good point.

> >* And lastly, I think its just a really novel idea! :)

You can't beat that one!

--
